item.title: Director Jay Roach Discusses Crafting Bombshell with Charlize Theron [Exclusive]
item.description: We chat with director Jay Roach about his latest movie Bombshell in our exclusive interview.

item.title: Daniel Radcliffe Talks Escape from Pretoria and His Post-Harry Potter Career [Exclusive]
item.description: We chat with Daniel Radcliffe about his new movie Escape From Pretoria, his post Harry Potter-life and much more in our exclusive interview.

item.title: Anya Taylor-Joy Brings the Fun to Jane Austen in Emma [Exclusive]
item.description: We speak with Anya Taylor-Joy about her new movie Emma and more in our exclusive interview.

item.title: Anya Taylor-Joy Talks Magik and The New Mutants Finally Coming Out [Exclusive]
item.description: Magik actress Anya Taylor-Joy talks with us about The New Mutants finally hitting theaters after a long delay.

item.title: The Impractical Jokers Talk About Why You Need to See Their Movie [Exclusive]
item.description: We chat with Joe Gatto, Sal Vulcano, Brian Quinn and James Murray about Impractical Jokers: The Movie in our exclusive interview.

item.title: The Men Behind Mr. McFeely on A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood [Exclusive]
item.description: We speak with Mr. McFeely actor David Newell, and Daniel Krell, who played Mr. Rogers' counterpart in A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood.

item.title: Sonic the Hedgehog Actress Tika Sumpter Talks Bringing the Video Game to Life [Exclusive]
item.description: We chat with Tika Sumpter about the Sonic the Hedgehog movie and more in our exclusive interview.

item.title: Brahms: The Boy II Star Christopher Convery on Creepy Dolls and What Freaks Him Out [Exclusive]
item.description: We chat with Christopher Convery about his new movie Brahms: The Boy 2 and more in our exclusive interview.

item.title: Director Oz Perkins Talks Being Faithful to the Fairytale in Gretel & Hansel [Exclusive]
item.description: We chat with director Oz Perkins about his new movie Gretel & Hansel and much more in our exclusive interview.

item.title: Gabriel Luna on Becoming the Rev-9 in Terminator: Dark Fate [Exclusive]
item.description: We talk with Gabriel Luna about what it took for him to become the REV-9 in Terminator: Dark Fate.

item.title: Tommy Chong Talks Color Out of Space and Being Scared of Horror Movies [Exclusive]
item.description: We chat with Tommy Chong about his new movie Color Out of Space and how horror movies affect him in our exclusive interview.

item.title: Warwick Davis Talks Maleficent 2 and His Role in the Star Wars Future [Exclusive]
item.description: We chat with Warwick Davis about Maleficent: Mistress of Evil and much more in our exclusive interview.

item.title: The Mercenary Star Dominique Vandenberg Explains What It Takes to Be an Action Movie Star
item.description: When a mission in South America goes wrong a mercenary is left for dead. Actor Dominique Vandenberg talks about the action of The Mercenary.

item.title: Jessica Henwick Talks Underwater, Godzilla Vs Kong, The Matrix 4 and More [Exclusive]
item.description: We speak with Jessica Henwick about her new movie Underwater and much more in our exclusive interview.

item.title: Jerry Bruckheimer Talks Gemini Man and His Legendary Career [Exclusive]
item.description: Producer Jerry Bruckheimer chats with us about Gemini Man, some of his upcoming projects and more in our exclusive interview.

item.title: Michelle Monaghan Talks Netflix's Messiah and More [Exclusive]
item.description: We chat with Michelle Monaghan about her new Netflix show Messiah and more in our exclusive interview.

item.title: Uncut Gems Directors Discuss Turning Adam Sandler Into a Shady NYC Jeweler [Exclusive]
item.description: A chat with writers/directors Josh and Benny Safdie about their new movie Uncut Gems, turning Adam Sandler into a dark character and more in our exclusive interview.

item.title: 6 Underground Actor Ben Hardy Talks About the Bayhem in the Netflix Movie [Exclusive]
item.description: We chat with actor Ben Hardy about his latest movie, Michael Bay's 6 Underground in our exclusive interview.

item.title: RoboDoc Filmmakers Reveal What They Found Creating the Definitive RoboCop Documentary [Exclusive]
item.description: So-directors & co-writers Eastwood Allen and Christopher Griffiths join producer Gary Smart for an insightful looking into the making of RoboDoc: The Creation of Robocop.

item.title: David Arquette Talks Bringing a Real Hero to Life in Mob Town [Exclusive]
item.description: We chat with David Arquette about his new movie Mob Town and much more in our exclusive interview.

item.title: Robin Lord Taylor Talks Alternate Universes, Shifting Timelines and The Mandela Effect [Exclusive]
item.description: Robin Lord Taylor plays the voice of reason as one family begins to unravel after an unfortunate incident in The Mandela Effect.

item.title: 10 Years After MacGruber, Jasper Cole Is Back with His New Movie Anyone Home? [EXCLUSIVE]
item.description: The man who played MacGruber, actor Jasper Cole, is back to talk about his latest film, Anyone Home?. Available now on VOD.

item.title: Tara Wood Talks Her Deep Dive on Tarantino in QT8: The First Eight [Exclusive]
item.description: QT8: The First Eight director Tara Wood chats with us about her new Quentin Tarantino documentary.

item.title: Leslie Iwerks Talks Crafting The Imagineering Story for Disney+ [Exclusive]
item.description: Disney veteran Leslie Iwerks chats with us about pulling back the curtain on Disney's Imagineers for The Imagineering Story.

item.title: Larisa Oleynik Talks Animal Among Us, Alex Mack, and 10 Things I Hate About You [Exclusive]
item.description: We spoke with Larisa Oleynik about her part in Animal Among Us and some of her other most memorable roles.

item.title: The Fare Star Brinna Kelly Talks Filmmaking, The Twilight Zone, and Brent Spiner [Exclusive]
item.description: The Fare writer, producer, and star Brinna Kelly spoke with us about the film and her work as a filmmaker.

item.title: Isabella Blake-Thomas Talks Supernatural Teen Adventure League of Legend Keepers: Shadows [Exclusive]
item.description: Once Upon A Time's Isabella Blake-Thomas returns to the supernatural realm for her latest film, teen adventure jaunt, League of Legend Keepers: Shadows.

item.title: Charles Bronson Doppleganger Robert Bronzi Talks Once Upon a Time in Deadwood [Exclusive]
item.description: Robert Bronzi talks about doppleganging Charles Bronson in several movies, including his latest, Once Upon A Time in Deadwood.

item.title: Midway Cast and Director Roland Emmerich Talk Crafting a WWII Epic [Exclusive]
item.description: Director Roland Emmerich as well as stars Ed Skrein and Luke Kleintank chat with us about their new movie Midway.

item.title: Bunnyman Massacre Franchise Star Marshal Hilton Talks Echoes of Fear [Exclusive]
item.description: Actor Marshal Hilton talks about returning to the horror genre for Echoes of Fear, now in select theaters.

item.title: Black and Blue Director Deon Taylor Talks His New, Timely Cop Thriller [Exclusive]
item.description: Deon Taylor talks his big year as a director, his new movie Black and Blue and more in our exclusive interview.

item.title: Lisa Coronado Talks Creepshow-esque Holiday Hell and Starring Alongside Jeffrey Combs [Exclusive]
item.description: Actress Lisa Coronado talks Holiday Hell, the new horror movie from Uncork'd Entertainment.

item.title: The Gallows: Act II Directors Talk Bringing Back the Hangman [Exclusive]
item.description: Directors Chris Lofing and Travis Cluff talk about their new movie The Gallows: Act II and more with us in our exclusive interview.

item.title: Jesse Eisenberg and Director Ruben Fleischer Talk Zombieland: Double Tap [Exclusive]
item.description: We chat with director Ruben Fleischer and star Jesse Eisenberg about revisiting Zombieland a decade later in Zombieland: Double Tap.

item.title: Jason Mewes Talks Jay and Silent Bob Reboot, Jay's Future and More [Exclusive]
item.description: We chat with Jason Mewes about working with his buddy Kevin Smith in Jay and Silent Bob Reboot in our exclusive interview.

item.title: The Black String Director Brian Hanson Talks Frankie Muniz & Psychological Horror [Exclusive]
item.description: We spoke with The Black String director Brian Hanson about working with Frankie Muniz on the psychological thriller.

item.title: Harley Quinn Smith Talks Jay and Silent Bob Reboot and More [Exclusive]
item.description: We chat with Harley Quinn Smith about her big year, working with her dad, Kevin Smith, Jay and Silent Bob Reboot and more.

item.title: Tony Hale Talks Toy Story 4 and Forky Asks a Question Disney+ Shorts [Exclusive]
item.description: We speak with Tony Hale all about Forky in Toy Story 4, his new Disney+ series and more in our exclusive interview.

item.title: Crawl Director Alexandre Aja Talks Crafting His Killer Alligator Horror Flick [Exclusive]
item.description: We talk with Alexandre Aja about his latest movie Crawl and his career making horror movies in our exclusive interview.

item.title: Freddy's Revenge Stars Kim Myers & Robert Rusler Talk Scream, Queen! Doc [Exclusive]
item.description: We chat with A Nightmare on Elm Street 2: Freddy's Revenge stars Kim Myers and Robert Rusler about the iconic 80s horror movie and the new Scream, Queen documentary.

item.title: Scooter Director Matt Wohl Talks About How to Become a Youtube Star [Exclusive]
item.description: Matt Wohl gives us the scoop on his Youtube set nail-biting thriller, Scooter.

item.title: Toy Story 4 Director Josh Cooley on Bringing Back Woody and the Gang [Exclusive]
item.description: Josh Cooley discusses taking on Toy Story 4, the challenges that come along with such a project and more in our exclusive interview.

item.title: Seeds Director Owen Long Talks About His Gothic Horror Movie [Exclusive]
item.description: A story of temptations and monsters, director Owen Long talks about anticipating the audience's reaction to his new thriller, Seeds.

item.title: Mark Patton and Scream, Queen Directors Talk About the New Legacy of Elm Street 2 [Exclusive]
item.description: Mark Patton and directors Roman Chimienti and Tyler Jensen talk about the gayest horror movie ever made in their documentary, Scream, Queen! My Nightmare on Elm Street.

item.title: Devil's Revenge Director Talks About Dragging William Shatner to Hell [Exclusive]
item.description: Devil's Revenge director Jared Cohn takes us through his new sci-fi horror movie starring two Star Trek alumni William Shatner and Jeri Ryan.

item.title: New Line Cinema Legend Bob Shaye Talks Ambition and Getting Back to Directing [Exclusive]
item.description: Legendary producer Bob Shaye is back for his third directorial effort, Ambition which in available on Digital and On Demand now from Shout! Factory.

item.title: Michael Gingold Talks Ad Nauseam II and the Horror Ads of the 1990s and 2000s [Exclusive]
item.description: Former Fangoria Editor-in-Chief, Michael Gingold, talks about his new book Ad Nauseam II and how advertising horror movies changed in the 90s and 00s.

item.title: Horror Icon Barbara Crampton Talks Reborn and Her Career's Second Act [Exclusive]
item.description: Catching up with Barbara Crampton about her career, her new movie Reborn, Castle Freak and much more.

item.title: I Like Scary Movies Creator Maximillian Takes Us Through the New Friday the 13th Exhibit [Exclusive]
item.description: I Like Scary Movies is coming back to Los Angeles with a new Friday the 13th exhibit just in time for Halloween.

item.title: Taika Waititi & Stephen Merchant Talk Hope, Hate and Jojo Rabbit at Fantastic Fest 2019
item.description: Writer/director Taika Waititi and star Stephen Merchant dive deep on their latest movie, Jojo Rabbit.
